short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you declare Java variables from XML view in android instantly with a click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Declaring variables in Android activity class from XML file is a time consuming process. Save those 10-15mins in declaring large view variables by using this extension. Just copy-paste your XML file and get a Java function to use instantly.
